name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Speedy Meetings for Google Calendar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create meetings in Google Calendar that start later, rather than end earlier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We've all been there: a calendar full of nonstop back-to-back meetings that don't allow you to use the restroom, grab some water, or just mentally reset. Google's legacy Speedy Meetings feature tries to help, but in reality, everyone blows past those :25 or :50 meeting end times. It's just human nature.

What if meetings started 5 minutes later instead? You're guaranteed a quick break between meetings to stretch, get coffee, and prepare for the next one. Your future self – and your meeting attendees – will thank you.

That's exactly what this extension does. Set your preferred start time buffer once, then enjoy creating Google Calendar meetings that start a few minutes later by default. 

If you currently use Google Calendar's legacy Speedy Meetings feature, this extension supports that, too – so you'll be able to give yourself some time before and after your meetings.
